price: dan menghilangkan panas hati orang-orang mukmin.  Dan Allah menerima tobat orang yang dikehendaki-Nya.  Allah maha Mengetahui lagi Maha Bijaksana.
arabic: وَيُذۡهِبۡ غَيۡظَ قُلُوبِهِمۡۗ وَيَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayudh'hib ghayẓa qulūbihim wayatūbu al-lahu ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
